events.blurb: Ralston Potter seated in the Wizengamot
events.description:
[Ralston] Potter was seated in the [Wizengamot] from 1612 to 1652.
He is known for his participation in the debates surounding the [Statute of Secrecy].

events.blurb: Witch hunting begins to peak in Europe
events.description: During roughly the years 1618 to 1648, witch hunting reaches its peak in Europe.  This coincides with the 30 years war.

[Mnemone] is best known as the developer of Memory Modification Charms.
From this we know they were developed at least slightly before this time.
